alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 9:25PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN FAIRFIELD AND NORTHEASTERN PICKAWAY COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EDT... At 924 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Ashville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Circleville, Ashville, Baltimore, Pleasantville, Royalton, Lithopolis, Amanda, Thurston, Carroll, Fairfield County Airport, East Ringgold, Duvall, Slate Run Metro Park, Dumontville and State Route 674 at State Route 188. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
